descriptionHtml:
So after ive seen my first dragon priest in skyrim, i was blown of my computer out of awesomeness, seconds later the same happened to my character, taking the blown off part a bit too serious.

Anyway, i thought they don\'t quite look how they should in my oppinion, so here is my definition of the \"right\" looking.

Installation: Extract the files into your Skyrim main directory.
Un-installation: Delete the folder \"dragonpriest\" in your \"textures\" directory of skyrim.
Since i prefer and freakin RECOMMEND the manual way of installing it\'s non-NMM download.

Enjoy your new dragonpriests, if you\'re playing as one, or playing against one. :)
author: Acran2004
